title: Start
body:
<<set $gameover to false>>

Customer: Ha...
Customer: Whiskey please.

title: GetGlassDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 0>>
Customer: Thanks.
Customer: It's been a while since I ended up here.
Customer: I don't think I've seen you?
Customer: You new?

[[Yes|2A]]
[[No, not really|2B]]

title: 2A
body:
Customer: Oh. Okay.
Customer: Wonder what happened to the last bartender.
Customer: Doesn't matter though.
Customer: I've missed this.
Customer: ...Hey.
Customer: Can I get another?

title: 2B
body:
Customer: Huh.
Customer: I must've been away longer than I thought.
Customer: Though I find that hard to believe.
Customer: I'm pretty sure you're new...
Customer: ...
Customer: I've missed this.
Customer: ...Hey.
Customer: Can I get another?

title: GetNotDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 2>>

Customer: Thanks...?
Customer: Sigh.
Customer: It's been a while since I ended up here.
Customer: I don't think I've seen you?
Customer: You new?

[[Yes|2A]]
[[No, not really|2B]]

title: GetDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 1>>

Customer: Uh...this is a lot.
Customer: Can't you just give it to me in a glass? Or something?

title: 3A
body:
Customer: I don't know if I want to talk about it...
Customer: But thanks for asking.
Customer: Roommate troubles, et cetera.
Customer: Anyway, that's it for today then.
Customer: I'll be back, unfortunately.
Customer: See you around.

<<set $gameover to true>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>

title: 3B
body:
Customer: Bet I didn't help with that.
Customer: Haha...
Customer: Yep. You know it.
Customer: Anyway, that's it for today then.
Customer: I'll be back, unfortunately.
Customer: See you around.

<<set $gameover to true>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>

title: GetGlassDrink2
body:
<<if $rightdrink < 2>>
Customer: Thanks.
<<else>>
Customer: Hey, you got it right this time.
Customer: Haha.
<<endif>>

<<set $rightdrink to 0>>

Customer: This is some smooth whiskey.
Customer: Thanks again.
Customer: Nice break from all the shit that's been happening.

[[What's been happening?|3A]]
[[You know it.|3B]]

title: GetNotDrink2
body:
<<if $rightdrink < 2>>
Customer: Uhh.
Customer: Did I not order whiskey the first time...?
<<else>>
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Uh.
Customer: I know you're new and all, but seriously?
<<endif>>

<<set $rightdrink to 2>>

Customer: Whatever.
Customer: It's not the worst thing that happened today, I guess.

[[What's the worst thing?|3A]]
[[Sorry.|3C]]

title: GetDrink2
body:
<<if $rightdrink is 1>>
Customer: Again?
Customer: C'mon, man. Just put it in a cup...
<<else>>
Customer: Uh...this is a lot.
Customer: Can't you just give it to me in a glass? Or something?
<<endif>>

title: 3C
body:
Customer: Ah...
Customer: Sorry, I'm being an asshole, aren't I.
Customer: It's fine.
Customer: It's just some shit I'm going through.
Customer: Roommate's mad, no one likes me, boo hoo.
Customer: ...
Customer: Anyway, that's it for today then.
Customer: I'll be back, unfortunately.
Customer: See you around.

<<set $gameover to true>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>
